items.title: Mcap of eight of top-10 most valued firms erode by Rs 2 trn; TCS, LIC drop
items.description: State Bank of India's valuation dropped Rs 29,495.84 crore to Rs 6,98,440.13 crore and that of Bharti Airtel diminished Rs 28,379.54 crore to Rs 8,76,207.58 crore

items.title: Baazar Style Retail makes market debut; Quant MF joins Rs 1 trn AUM club
items.description: Quant Mutual Fund (MF) on Friday announced that its assets under management (AUM) has crossed the Rs 1 trillion mark
